attributes.action: deport whinging pensioners to far off countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we fought a war for this.. no you never, most pensioners today were too young to do anything in the war. its about time we followed in the eskimos footsteps, once your past it and become a drain.. we leave you out on the ice or at least deport you.
the whine, sponge money and contradict themselves constantly.
I'm not on the scrapheap you know, but i cant fill a form in.. i'm so poor but i have a 4 bed house for me and the cat..

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
